``` r
library(manCTMed)
```

## Data Generation


``` r
seed <- 1
set.seed(seed)
taskid <- 1
sim <- GenData(taskid = taskid)
plot(sim)
```

<img src="fig-vignettes-replication-unnamed-chunk-4-1.png" width="3300" /><img src="fig-vignettes-replication-unnamed-chunk-4-2.png" width="3300" /><img src="fig-vignettes-replication-unnamed-chunk-4-3.png" width="3300" />

``` r
data <- RandomMeasurement(sim)
str(data)
```

## Confidence Intervals (Unstandardized)

### Model $\eta_X \to \eta_M \to \eta_Y$

#### Delta Method


``` r
delta <- DeltaXMY(phi_hat = phi_hat)
plot(delta)
```

#### Monte Carlo Method


``` r
mc <- MCXMY(phi_hat = phi_hat, seed = seed)
plot(mc)
```

#### Parametric Bootstrap Method


``` r
B <- 1000L
path <- root$find_file(
  ".setup",
  "data-raw"
)
prefix <- "pb_replication"
```


``` r
boot <- BootPara(
  fit = fit,
  path = path,
  prefix = prefix,
  taskid = taskid,
  B = B,
  ncores = parallel::detectCores(),
  seed = seed,
  clean = FALSE
)
```


``` r
pb <- BootParaXMY(boot = boot, phi_hat = phi_hat)
plot(pb)
```

``` r
plot(pb, type = "bc")
```
